nodes.text: Melsa Dor was a female sentient being who lived during the time of the Clone Wars.

Dor was a crewmember aboard a transport that was involved in evacuating the planet Argul during the Battle of Argul. The Argullian merchant Turyit attempted to bribe her into letting him bring some barrels of bacta with him aboard the transport. However, she saw that they were being watched by the Jedi Padawans Olge Plavi-Dol and Wamtra, so she declined his offer and hurried back to work.
